bibdata.title: IEEE standard for preferred ratings, related requirements, and application recommendations for low-voltage AC (635 V and below) and DC (3200 V and below) power circuit breakers
IEEE standard for preferred ratings, related requirements, and application recommendations for low-voltage AC (635 V and below) and DC (3200 V and below) power circuit breakers

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard defines the preferred ratings for low-voltage ac (635 V and below) power circuit breakers, general purpose dc (325 V and below) power circuit breakers, heavy duty low- voltage dc (3200 V and below) power circuit breakers, and fused (integrally or non-integrally) low- voltage ac (600 V and below) power circuit breakers.

This standard defines the preferred ratings for low-voltage ac (635 V and below) power circuit breakers, general purpose dc (325 V and below) power circuit breakers, heavy duty lowvoltage dc (3200 V and below) power circuit breakers, and fused (integrally or non-integrally) lowvoltage ac (600 V and below) power circuit breakers.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: dc power circuit breaker; integrally fused low-voltage ac power circuit breaker; low-voltage; non-integrally fused low-voltage ac power circuit breaker; power circuit breaker
